page.title: 11INDUSTRY PIG FARMING
page.content: {WESTAWAYS} have been in business for eight years.They breed pigs for the market and also for freezing.They send about 40 pigs each week to the slaughter house when they are around 140 pounds weight.They will have been at the pig farm between 17 -18 weeks, and will have been born at the farm. The farm usually has 90 sows and 5 boars.The new boar is called Amos.When the piglets are new-born they have to have their teeth clipped so that they are not too sharp for the sows teat when they are feeding.If there are any weak piglets they are put into a weaning shed.If one sow has only 4 or 5 piglets and another sow has 14 or 15,they share the piglets between them.Westaways also have a shop where they sell their own pork,and other frozen food.Four people work there. The farm is just outside the village.
